attributes.additional_details: I believe that with the services of the local Hartlepools Hospital being moved out of the town, the people of the town, and surrounding areas, has been put in serious danger of having no medical cover, and the death rates will rise dramatically. Therefore, I request the Teeside and Hartlepool foundation health trust should be investigated, as to why they believe, that a town of our size should be without any credible medical services. And we should travel miles to access any....
